DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. A 32-week efficacy and safety comparison of insulin detemir and insulin semilente MC in children between 6 and 21 years with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Insulin Detemir and Insulin Semilente®MC in Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes Current intensified insulin treatment Injection of insulin Semilente®MC at bedtime for at least 6 weeks BMI maximum 32 kg/m^2 HbA1c > 5.5 % and < 12.0 % Current treatment with premixed insulin(s) Impaired hepatic or renal function Recurrent major hypoglycaemia
